abstract: Myanmar opposition leader Daw Aung San Suu Kyi meets with Chinese Pres Xi Jinping at Great Hall of the People during her five-day visit to Beijing; Communist Party leader Xi says visit will help promote ties between two countries.
lead_paragraph: For Ms. Aung San Suu Kyi, the visit is seen as a step in her transformation from global icon of democracy to credible candidate to be Myanmar’s next leader.

headline.main: Aung San Suu Kyi of Myanmar Meets With Xi Jinping in Beijing
headline.print_headline: Aung San Suu Kyi Meets With Beijing Leadership

snippet: For Ms. Aung San Suu Kyi, the visit is seen as a step in her transformation from global icon of democracy to credible candidate to be Myanmar’s next leader.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
